reviewText: I want seasons 4 & 5!!!!!! I really think we've waited too long on the remaining two seasons, its ridicules!!! I think others would agree with me.
Title: Taxi - Seasons 1-3

reviewText: Taking our time, haven't watched many of the shows yet, will do so over time, just happy to have all three seasons.
Title: Taxi - Seasons 1-3

reviewText: My most favorite TV sitcom.I watch this series all the time to keep me happy.I wish season 4 and 5 would become available soon.Many of us are asking where the other season's are but it seems they do not want to put it out. I wonder why?
Title: Taxi - Seasons 1-3

reviewText: Hey!  Guess What?  Volume four and five will be released in 2009.I felt stuck.  I'm a completist so I really hate being stuck with an incomplete concept like, for instance, the entire 5 seasons of "Taxi".I was beginning to become afraid to start buying any TV shows on DVD for fear that they may decide not to finish what they started.Well, thank God we will finally get to own all five seasons of "Taxi". I was wondering what CBS was waiting for.
summary: So, when are they going to release the last two seasons?
Title: Taxi - Seasons 1-3

reviewText: One of those true New York style sitcoms that you can enjoy watching many years later. It is fun reconnecting with all the old familiar characters.
Title: Taxi - Seasons 1-3
